ygData.subject: Here is the Spell list
ygData.msgSnippet: Due to the overwhelming response, I ve sent the file to the group.  If you respond to this message or the digest, please make sure the file is no longer
ygData.messageBody:
Due to the overwhelming response, I've sent the file to the group. If
you respond to this message or the digest, please make sure the file is
no longer attached. Feel free to make additions and corrections on the
spread sheet and E-Mail them Directly To Me (Save Bandwidth). I will
then compile the changes and E-mail the updated copy to the group.
Before opening the spread sheet please note that it is a spoiler. It
contains all the spells I have heard about up to level 49, components
needed to research the spell, and I've recently began adding which city
the spell can be bought. Most things on the spell list still need to be
verified. There are also several columns for casting time, please only
fill in the first column with your channeling skill, and the casting
times for the spells you own. Also, don't worry about the damage/mana
ratio. I'll finish that after all the cahnges are compiled.

Enjoy

Malkin
